name: The Usher Foundation VIII: The Spiral
name_original: The Usher Foundation VIII: The Spiral
description:
A fan game for Rusty Quill's The Magnus Archives podcast.

By all maps you should be in the middle of the East river. Which makes the very 60s living room you're standing in kind of odd.

The Magnus Archives is my favorite podcast, so I thought it would be cool to make a short fan game or two. Also a good excuse to explore more form stuff with Twine!
